section.name: Objective
section.p: Some time a project which has its own torque schema, om and sqls depends on another torque enabled project. As a supplement of maven torque plugin, xtorque plugin provides torque operations for multi torque enabled projects.
Here is a list of goals of cross torque plugin

tr.td: Copy the sqldb.map before executing all sqls. So the developer is able to control the order of sql execution.
Generate insert sqls from all the schema files.
